data.title: Air Traffic Control Simulation
data.description: An interactive simulation of air traffic control procedures and communication

steps.prompt: Establish initial contact with the aircraft. Choose the correct radio phraseology:

choices.text: Welcome to ICAO Tower, what is your position?
choices.feedback: Correct! This is the standard way to initiate contact.

choices.text: Hello aircraft, what do you want?
choices.feedback: Incorrect. Always use proper radio phraseology.

steps.prompt: Provide departure clearance to the aircraft. Select the correct phraseology:

choices.feedback: Correct! Clear and concise clearance given.
Incorrect. Must use proper clearance phraseology.

data.title: Emergency Response Simulation
data.description: Practice handling emergency situations in aviation

steps.prompt: An aircraft has declared an emergency. Choose the correct response:

choices.feedback: Correct! Always ask for the nature of emergency first.

steps.prompt: Coordinate emergency landing procedures. Select the correct phraseology:

choices.text: Cleared emergency landing runway 27L, emergency services standing by
choices.feedback: Correct! Proper coordination with emergency services.

choices.text: Land on any runway you want
choices.feedback: Incorrect. Must specify runway and coordinate with emergency services.
